toc.text: 切换已有 ohmyzsh 至镜像源

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"安装","children":"安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在本地克隆后获取安装脚本。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
cd ohmyzsh/tools
REMOTE={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} sh install.sh","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"切换已有-ohmyzsh-至镜像源","children":"切换已有 ohmyzsh 至镜像源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git -C $ZSH remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
git -C $ZSH pull","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]
